availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Gunderson Jordan (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native.Son of William S. Jordan. Married to Mary E. Bryars Jordan in Hickman County on January 2, 1856. Father of Lena Jordan, Anna Jordan, and Virgie Jordan. Farmer in Hickman County in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 21A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 456.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 476B.
